message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be of significant value to your business.  While I can't reveal all the details yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, which is a fair price considering its potential. This is a limited-time offer, so let me know your decision soon.
